desc: New Meditation/Yoga Cushion to Bring More Comfort to the Mindfulness Movement. ZenGo™ designs air-filled meditation/yoga cushion sets that help meditators and yogis tailor their props to their specific needs so they can practice longer in comfort anywhere.

layout.text: Modern Comfort Meditation/Yoga Cushion Set | Great for Home or Travel | Indoor and Outdoor Use | Set Includes Inflator Pump
